subtitle: Tuna makes a great store cupboard standby.

method.text: Mix together tuna and sauce, potatoes, onion, lemon juice and season to taste. With floured hands, shape into 8 (2 per person) round flat cakes. Dip in beaten egg, then coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry fish cakes for 5-6 min or until golden brown. Drain on crumpled up kitchen paper. Serve piping hot.

title: Tuna fish cakes
